project_plan.name: Simple Contact Book in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a simple contact book application that allows users to add, search, update, and delete contacts, with contact information stored in a JSON file.

task.name: Implement the feature to add a contact
Implement the feature to search for a contact
Implement the feature to update an existing contact
Implement the feature to delete a contact
Write tests for each of the implemented features above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure they function correctly
